images.caption: Figure 1:Overview ofMisSynthsynthetic data generation and fine-tuning pipeline. A RAG retrieves an article excerpt (EiE_{i}) from a source article (SS) based on a MISSCI claim (qiq_{i}). This excerpt, along with a dev split sample (ùíú\mathcal{A}), is used by aGeneration LLMto create a synthetic dataset (ùíüsyn\mathcal{D}_{\mathrm{syn}}). This dataset is then used to fine-tune a model with LoRA, which is finally evaluated on the MISSCI test split.
